tweet_text: @TheSkepticalHe1 "We don't hear" -  except in the ration tablets of Nebuchadnezzar's reign. Oops!  I'm all for debunking the lies in the Bible, but you cannot say there were no Jews prior to 300 BC when there are records in Babylon of a King of Judah from around c. 600 BCE.
text_en: "We don't hear" - except in the ration tablets of Nebuchadnezzar's reign. Oops! I'm all for debunking the lies in the Bible, but you cannot say there were no Jews prior to BC when there are records in Babylon of a King of Judah from around c. BCE.
